example.caption: compute location and get properties of a nebula
compare nebulae
get a property of a nebula
example.input: apparent magnitude of the Crab Nebula
example.caption: locate a nebula at a specified time
compute location and get properties of a planetary nebula
compare planetary nebulae
get a property of a planetary nebula

compute location and get properties of a bright H II region
compare H II regions
locate a bright H II region at a specified time
